title: Five-Star Playa del Carmen Oceanfront Resort with Infinity Pool & Jungle Spa
description:
Step away from the excitement of Mexico's Playa del Carmen and into the hidden sanctuary of Palmaïa, The House of AïA - an ultra-luxe, five-star haven. Tucked comfortably between white sands and lush jungle terrain, this idyllic hideaway offers dreamers and romantics a unique blend of holistic wellness, spiritual healing and luxurious comfort. The location is flawless, and the resort is perfectly positioned for guests to unearth Playa del Carmen’s wealth of must-see sights, including Mayan ruins and impressive snorkelling spots.

For those looking for an elevated stay, the resort offers a wide range of spiritual and holistic treatments. Treat yourself to massages at Atlantis Spa, set in the middle of the dense jungle and built around a natural, freshwater cenote, or discover dedicated yoga retreats, tarot readings, sound healing and more. If fine cuisine is more your cure, gourmands will find no shortage of impeccable dining at any of the resort’s four diverse restaurants.
